examples.translation: 由於一种莫名的精神错乱, 他把自己的名字忘了.
examples.last: to a strange mental aberration he forgot his own name.

examples.translation: 由於他们态度僵硬, 我们无法达成协议.
examples.last: to their intransigent attitude we were unable to reach an agreement.

examples.translation: 有些道路因积雪而封闭.

v: be obliged to pay or repay
be indebted to, in an abstract or intellectual sense
